alert.note: Alert for Logan; Phillips; Sedgwick (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 04 at 5:24PM MDT until August 04 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: The National Weather Service in Denver Colorado has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Logan County in northeastern Colorado... Phillips County in northeastern Colorado... Sedgwick County in northeastern Colorado... * Until 600 PM MDT. * At 523 PM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Barton to 5 miles southwest of Highland Center, or along a line extending from 4 miles northeast of Julesburg to 20 miles west of Holyoke, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. At 514 PM, a 65 mph wind gust was reported in Julesburg. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Julesburg around 530 PM MDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
